document_data.caption: A map showing the Deep House of Doom (labeled #14) in central Suldolphor.
document_data.name: Deep House of Doom
document_data.mainbody: The '''Deep House of Doom''' was a temple devoted to [[Beshaba]], the Maid of Misfortune, located in [[Suldolphor]] in far eastern [[Calimshan]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located underground beneath central Suldolphor. The temple was believed to lay beneath a block of shops bordered by [[Elabralal Street]], [[Milindral Street]], and [[Nousoorn Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Suldolphor}}
document_data.Description: The Deep House of Doom was small but heavily guarded. It connected to the cellars of several [[tavern]]s and [[festhall]]s.
document_data.Inhabitants: The temple was run by Mistress of Dread [[Shalarlane Druistrar]] in the {{YearlinkName|1367}}.
